categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens voice actors
Category:Star Wars: Forces of Destiny voice actors

nodes.text: Lupita Nyong'o (born March 1, 1983) is a Kenyan–Mexican actress, who portrayed Maz Kanata in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens and in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi through motion capture. Her involvement was first announced on June 2, 2014.

In Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, Nyong'o vocally reprised the role of Maz Kanata, while the character's physical appearance was realized through an animatronic puppet rather than motion capture.
